name: DOGS.IO
description:
Can you gain the biggest dog pack following?

Collect dogs from across several different maps, steal followers from other dogs and gather the biggest following of dogs possible to win!

• Collect dog followers
• Steal followers from other dog
• Gather the biggest following possible
• Unlock new dog breeds to play as

Use the mouse, the keyboard or a gamepad to control your dog. Run up to unclaimed dogs to have them follow you and join your pack, or run up to dogs following others with smaller packs than you to steal their dogs. The Dog with the most followers at the end of the round wins. Winning rounds allows you to earn doggy coins in order to unlock new breeds of dogs and colours to customise your dog.
